system.description:
Everything is a weapon if you hold it right. And you are the expert on holding things right to be used as weapons … and then smashing everything else. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your artificer levels count as berserker levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack feature.
  • Half your berserker levels count as artificer levels for the purpose of the Battlefield Smithing feature.
  • All damage you do while raging deals double damage to items and structures. If your attack would normally have the Breaker property, it stacks with this benefit, dealing quadruple damage instead.
  • You can spend a point of exertion to cast a spell from one of your spell inventions while raging. You can do this only once per rage.
  • You gain an additional Grinding Cog maneuver. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
